items.title: Current and ex-Meta employees submitted documents and affidavits to Congress alleging that Meta suppressed research on child safety risks in its VR platforms (Washington Post)
items.summary:
Washington Post:
Current and ex-Meta employees submitted documents and affidavits to Congress alleging that Meta suppressed research on child safety risks in its VR platforms  —  The company's lawyers intervened to shape research that might have shed light on risks in virtual reality, four current and former staffers have told Congress.

items.title: Thousands of Romanian teachers take to streets against school restructuring
items.summary: BUCHAREST (Reuters) -Thousands of Romanian teachers marched in the capital Bucharest and classes were suspended across the country at the start of the school year on Monday in protest against the restructuring of schools and an increase in weekly teaching hours. Read full story

items.title: Don’t miss DJI’s Mic Mini transmitter and receiver combo while they’re starting at just $39 today (All-time low)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, you’ll find DJI’s tiny Mic Mini Wireless Lavalier Microphone Transmitter for $39 shipped. You can get this in black and white finishes, and they’re both down to the $39 mark, which is $20 less than their usual going rate and the lowest we have tracked for them to date. Folks pairing it with DJI’s Osmo Action 4/5 Pro or Osmo Pocket 3 can get by with just the transmitter, but others will need the transmitter + receiver bundle, which is also discounted to $59 shipped, down from its usual going rate of $89. Amazon is additionally offering the 2 TX + 1 RX + charging case combo for $109 shipped, which also happens to be the lowest price we’ve seen for it, down from $169. There has never been a better time to snag DJI’s Mic Mini microphone, so be sure to snag the deals after getting more details below.

items.summary:
The Digital Ministry has launched the nation’s first vehicle forensics laboratory to aid in incident investigations.
